name: PreciousMetalPrices
0:
”Alexa, ask Manhattan Gold for the price of gold on March 10 1986”
”Alexa, open Manhattan Gold”
”Alexa, ask Manhattan Gold about silver price on yesterday”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: manhattan gold
des:
Manhattan Gold & Silver (MGS) started in 1985 as a small, family-owned gold refinery. Since then, we’ve grown into one of the country’s leading precious metal refining firms. The London market fixings are internationally published benchmarks for precious metals prices. This Alexa skill can tell you the current London fix prices for gold, silver, platinum or palladium. You can also ask for the published closing price of any precious metal for a specific day to help you understand historical trends. 

The MGS Alexa skill is now in version 1.0. Please let us know what features you’d like to see added, or where we can make improvements.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
